#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef struct node
{
	long long first;
	long long second;

}Node;

// Node arr[10001];

bool comp(Node a,Node b){
	if(a.first == b.first)
		return a.second<b.second;
	return a.first>b.first;
}

/*bool comp(Node lhs,Node rhs)
{
	return (lhs.first > rhs.first);
}*/

int main()
{

	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);


	long long n;

	cin>>n;

	Node arr[n];

	long long b,c;

	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>b>>c;

		// printf("%d\n",b*c);

		arr[i].first = b*c;
		arr[i].second = i+1;

		// printf("%d\n",arr[i].first);

	}

	sort(arr,arr+n,comp);

	long long q,k;

	cin>>q;

	while(q--)
	{
		cin>>k;

		cout<<arr[k-1].second<<endl;
	}

	/*for(int i = 0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cout<<arr[i].first<<" "<<arr[i].second<<endl;
	}*/

}
